content: {"version":2,"machineId":"1825983e-1a0f-40c2-b9ff-62146825667b","content":"{\"windows\":\"// Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaults\\n[\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+n\\\", // \\\"cmd+n\\\" on mac\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"extension.advancedNewFile\\\",\\n    },\\n    { \\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+m\\\",  \\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"wwm.aligncode\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\" }\\n]\"}"}
